### Import

```ts
import { GeometryLine } from "@tai-kun/surrealdb/data-types/decode-only";
import { GeometryLine } from "@tai-kun/surrealdb/data-types/encodable";
import { GeometryLine } from "@tai-kun/surrealdb/data-types/standard";
```

### `.constructor()`

Creates a new `GeometryLine` object.

```ts
new GeometryLine(source);
```

#### Arguments

##### `source`

In progress.

#### Return Value

When called through `new`, `GeometryLine` returns its instance.
